sentences.sContent: They cover him quickly as the crowbar clangs to the ground.
sentences.sContent_eng: They cover him quickly as the crowbar clangs to the ground.
sentences.sCn: 他们迅速掩盖了洞口，撬棍当啷一声，落在了地上。

sentences.sContent: I pried it loose with a crowbar and hoisted it into the wheelbarrow.
sentences.sContent_eng: I pried it loose with a crowbar and hoisted it into the wheelbarrow.
sentences.sCn: 我用撬棍把它撬松，然后搬到了手推车里。

sentences.sContent: I was holding a large crowbar, and my co-worker was holding a sledgehammer.
sentences.sContent_eng: I was holding a large crowbar, and my co-worker was holding a sledgehammer.
sentences.sCn: 我拿着一根很大的撬棍，我的同事拿着一把大锤。

trans.tranOther: a heavy iron bar used to lift something or force it open
